name: Edgeoid
description:
A game made for 2021's VimJam 2.0. As the title suggests, it's a metroidvania where you move along the edge of the screen. Navigate a maze of rooms, learn new abilities, and defeat the 5 bosses to beat the game!

This is my second game ever. It has a few bugs, including game-breaking ones. I ran out of time to correct them all. But it's still a lot of fun!
